original: ma bsgrubs kyang bklags pas 'grub ste gi wang la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te dpral bar thig le byas na kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bsgrubs kyang bklags pas 'grub ste gi wang la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te dpral bar thig le byas na kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even without practice, it is accomplished by recitation. Enchanting realgar one hundred and eight times, make a bindu on the forehead. One will be delightful to everyone.

original: ti tsha la sngags te mig la bskus na gar bltas pa mig sprad mthun no //
analyzed: ti tsha la sngags te mig la bskus na gar bltas pa mig sprad mthun no //
translated: Enchanting collyrium and applying it to the eyes, wherever one looks, the eyes will be agreeable.

original: chu la sngags te 'thungs na gzhan rnams zas ster snying 'dod do //
analyzed: chu la sngags te 'thungs na gzhan rnams zas ster snying 'dod do //
translated: Enchanting water and drinking it, others will be eager to give food.
